title: Google Play Store highlights easy ways to donate to support Ukraine, including using Play Points
content:
In its latest show of support for Ukraine during the ongoing conflict with Russia, Google is now showcasing support for those affected in the country with easy donations within the Play Store.

The post Google Play Store highlights easy ways to donate to support Ukraine, including using Play Points appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google is currently highlighting donations through the Play Store to support the citizens of Ukraine during the conflict with Russia.
